description:
More useful against cold than blades,
but it's all we had on hand.
name: Warm Jacket

description: A little stuffy, but somewhat effective.
name: Cloth Armor

description: It's not stealth armor, it's strips of animal skin.
name: Hide Wrappings

description: Makes you as tough as a cow.
name: Leather Armor

description: This came from cows that knew how to party.
name: Studded Leather

description: It has a lot of layers.
name: Silk Armor

description: It's kind of like wearing a quilt.
name: Gambeson

description:
Nobody has actually found a historical example of ring mail.
Until now I guess.
name: Ring Mail

description: This is nothing like the parade armor our guards wear.
name: Chain Mail

description: It's like a gambeson, but with a metal endoskeleton.
name: Brigandine

description: It certainly draws attention.
name: Rivet Chain

description: It's the third best lamellar we've ever seen.
name: Bronze Lamellar

description: It's never a good idea to make these anatomically correct.
name: Breastplate

description:
No, we can't combine two of these to make a full plate.
Stop asking.
name: Half Plate

description:
Not actually made from reptile scales.
I'm disappointed.
name: Scale Mail

description: You've got more than enough on your plate already.
name: Full Plate

description:
Rare: Made from the fur of animals that drank a
lot of deuterium.
name: Heavy Fur Jacket

description: Rare:  Too late for Halloween unfortunately.
name: Hallowed Robes

description:
Rare: Trust me, it's a good thing they left
the eyes off of this one.
name: Basilisk Hide Armor

description: Rare: Wait, if they're immortal... why did they need armor?
name: Immortals Guard

description: Rare: Why do you never find Mithril Trousers?
name: Mithril Shirt

description:
Rare: The average villager can only wear three of
it's rings.
name: Colossal Mail

description: Rare: STILL not made of reptile scales.
name: Dragon Mail

description: Rare: Worn by rather smallish titans... apparently.
name: Titan Mail

description:
Rare: Some would say it's 'supremely good', but
it's just okay.
name: Celestial Mail

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Divine Interdiction

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Interdiction+

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Interdiction++

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Interdiction+++

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Interdiction++++

description:
Rare: This is more of a concept than something you actually wear.
We didn't even have the graphics budget for full plate.
name: Interdiction++++

description: Made with love.
name: Sweater

description:
Hedge witches sell these, claiming they harbor
incredible medical benifits. (HP + 50)
name: Health Charm

description: It glows blue with untapped power. (MP + 50)
name: Manastone

description:
Guides the wearer's hand, helping them strike vulnerable
places. (10% chance of x2.5 damage)
name: Strikers's Ring

description:
This dreaded charm absorbs the life essence of those near
the wearer. (Heals 2% max HP/hit)
name: Syphons's Medallion

description:
A cursed mana stone put to good use: drains mana
and gives it to the wielder. (Heals 2% max mana/hit)
name: Siphonstone

description:
This translucent cloak obscures your form, making you
harder to hit. (20% chance to avoid all damage)
name: Shifter's Cloak
note:
<Common Item Level: 10>
<Specials: 20% chance to avoid all damage>

description:
Empowers those who wear it, aiding in their ascent to
legend. (+50% XP gain when worn)
name: Hero's Crest

description: Softens and deflects blows. (Def + 3)
name: Ring of Protection

description: Enchanted to add force to your blows. (Atk + 6)
name: Belt of Strength

description:
Common: It smoulders, but never quite goes out. (Fire damage
dealt + 25%)
name: Eternal Ember

description:
Enchanted Ice from the coldest nights.
(Ice damage dealt +25%)
name: Darkened Ice

description:
Common: A stone that magically controls electrical currents.
(Electrical damage dealt +25%)
name: Magic Thunderstone

description:
Pulled from the depths of the underdark and suffused
with earth magic. (Earth damage dealt + 25%)
name: Deep Obsidian

description:
A stone invigorating the wearer, protecting their
life essence. (HP + 100)
name: Lifestone

description:
A chunk of raw mana, crystallized by unfathomable
arcane power. (MP + 100)
name: Power Crystal

description: Softens and deflects blows. (Def + 5)
name: Deflection Ring

description: Enchanted to add force to your blows. (Atk + 10)
name: Belt of Massive Strength

description:
This translucent cloak obscures your form, making you
harder to hit. (25% chance to avoid all damage, +100 HP)
name: Phantoms's Cloak
note:
<Rare Item Level: 10>
<Specials: 25% chance to avoid all damage, +100 HP>

description:
Empowers those who wear it, aiding in their ascent to
legend. (+50% XP gain when worn, +8 Atk, +4 Def)
name: Champions's Crest
note:
<Rare Item Level: 11>
<Specials: +50% XP gained, +8 Atk, +4 Def>

description:
This dreaded charm absorbs the life essence of those near
the wearer. (Heals 2% max HP/hit)
name: Vampire's Medallion
note:
<Rare Item Level: 12>
<Specials: Heals 3% max HP/hit, +100 HP>

description:
A cursed mana stone put to good use: drains mana
and gives it to the wielder. (Heals 3% max mana/hit, +100 Mana))
name: Eldritch Stone
note:
<Rare Item Level: 14>
<Specials: Heals 3% max mana/hit, +100 Mana>

description:
Rare: It smoulders, but never quite goes out. (Fire damage
dealt + 50%, +100 Mana)
name: Eternal Flame
note:
<Rare Item Level: 13>
<Element Magnify 2: +50%>
<Specials: Fire Damage + 50%, +100 Mana>

description:
Rare: Ice from the arctic, enchanted to never melt.
(Ice damage dealt +50%, +50 Mana)
name: Hellrime Ice
note:
<Rare Item Level: 5>
<Element Magnify 3: +50%>
<Specials: Ice Damage +50%, Mana +50>

description:
Rare: A stone that magically controls electrical currents.
(Electrical damage dealt +50%, +150 Mana)
name: Magic Loadstone
note:
<Rare Item Level: 17>
<Element Magnify 4: +50%>
<Specials: Electrical Damage +50%, Mana +150>

description:
Rare: Pulled from the depths of the underdark and suffused
with earth magic. (Earth damage dealt + 50%, +75 Mana)
name: Deep Obsidian
note:
<Rare Item Level: 9>
<Element Magnify 6: +50%>
<Specials: Earth Damage +50%, Mana +75>

description:
Guides the wearer's hand, helping them strike vulnerable
places. (15% chance of x2.5 damage, Atk +8)
name: Assassin's Ring
note:
<Rare Item Level: 15>
<Specials: 15% chance x2.5 damage, Atk +8>

description:
Rare: A mantle passed down from warrior-king to warrior-king.
(HP, MP + 100, Atk +12, Def +6)
name: Cloak of Kings
note:
<Rare Item Level: 16>
<Specials: HP, MP +100, Atk +12, Def +6>

description:
Rare: Used by mages to channel magic. (All elemental damage
+50%, +200 mana)
name: Master's Orb
note:
<Rare Item Level: 18>
<Element Magnify 2: +50%>
<Element Magnify 3: +50%>
<Element Magnify 4: +50%>
<Element Magnify 6: +50%>
<Specials: Elemental Damage +50%, +200 MP>

description: Rare: Enchanted to make heroes out of commoners. (Atk, Def +10, 10% damage, +50% Exp)
name: Legend Crown
note:
<Rare Item Level: 19>
<Specials: Atk, Def +10, +10% Damage, +50% Exp>
